machineWorkSetting.description: Detects language of the text snippet
machineWorkSetting.name: Language Detection1

answer.answerHtml: Path to the text file, which you want to use for language detection

template.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<config>
  
  <var-def name="content">
    <#noparse>
    	<http url="${{{text_doc_link}}}"/>
    </#noparse>
  </var-def>
  
  
  <script><![CDATA[
  import com.freedomoss.crowdcontrol.webharvest.extractor.language.Language;

  if(sys.isVariableDefined("group_language")){
    String detected_language = group_language.toString();
    double detected_language_probability = 1.0;
  }else{
      Language l  = com.freedomoss.crowdcontrol.webharvest.extractor.language.LanguageExtractor.getInstance().extract(content.toString());
      
      String lang = l.getLang();
      int prob = (int)(l.getProb()*100.00);
     
      //!!!this needs to be verified, code below developed for POC use case!!!
      String groupLang = "NotDetected";
      if ( prob >= 98 ) {
        if ( "en".equals(lang) ) {
          groupLang = "English";
        } else if ( "es".equals(lang) || "pt".equals(lang) ) {
          groupLang = "Spanish";
        }
      } else if ( prob < 98 && ( "en".equals(lang) || "es".equals(lang) || "it".equals(lang) || "pt".equals(lang) ) ) {
       groupLang = "Spanish"; 
      }
      
      sys.defineVariable("group_language", groupLang, true);
      sys.defineVariable("detected_language", l.getLang(), true);
      sys.defineVariable("detected_language_probability", (int)(l.getProb()*100.00), true);
  }
  ]]></script>
  
  <export include-original-data="true">
    <single-column name="detected_language" value="${detected_language}"/>
    <single-column name="detected_language_probability" value="${detected_language_probability}"/>
    <single-column name="group_language" value="${group_language}"/>
  </export>
</config>
